DOC.brief_summary: This study examine muscle activity , movement pattern , oxygen consumption series yoga pose slow rapid transition .
DOC.criteria: Have least 1 year yoga experience ; Practice minimum twice per week ( app 2 hour ) ; Demonstrate good form pose ( asana ) make Sun A Sun B sequence ; If uncontrolled neuromuscular , orthopedic cardiovascular disease ; If advise physician exercise ; If complete three cycle Sun A B sequence good form .
